text: Okay.  Now today, we will look on what's that portion.  Anybody remembers anything, what the word portion means?  Raise your hand.  Portion.  What does the word portion mean? Yes, Student M?

text: A portion of something is part of a whole, like we have 22 students in this class, so 22 would be our big whole.  Now 1, 2, 3 students out of 22 are sitting at the front.  So 3 is a portion or part of 22.  Now, we have looked at fractions, and we have looked at some percents or [inaudible], so today we are going to continue that lesson.
